title: Malware types encountered during data compromise investigations 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of encounters for 9 number of Type Of Malwares.
The maximum Share of encounters 13.0 is found at Type Of Malware Downloader and the minimum is found at Ransomware where Type Of Malware is 0.7.
The highest Type Of Malware Downloader has 12.3 more Share of encounters than the lowest Type Of Malware Ransomware.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type Of Malware, and Share of encounters in each Type Of Malware on the y axis.
The Share of encounters is highest at Type Of Malware Downloader and lowest at Type Of Malware Ransomware.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of encounters for 9 number of Type Of Malwares.
The maximum Share of encounters 13.0 is found at Type Of Malware Downloader and the minimum is found at Ransomware where Type Of Malware is 0.7.
The highest Type Of Malware Downloader has 12.3 more Share of encounters than the lowest Type Of Malware Ransomware.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type Of Malware, and Share of encounters in each Type Of Malware on the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
There is a difference of 12.3 between the maximum Type Of Malware Downloader and minimum Type Of Malware Ransomware.

Type Of Malware Downloader is higher than any other Type Of Malwares with value 13.0, followed by Remote administration tool (RAT), and Memory scraper/dumper. Down to Type Of Malware Ransomware with the lowest value 0.7.
Type Of Malware Webshell, and Memory scraper/dumper have a similar Share of encounters that is 8.0.
Considered together, the average Share of encounters in all 9 Type Of Malwares is roughly 5.97.
